page.title: 15MOREFIELDS QUARRY,ULLAPOOL.
page.content: KINGS & CO.LTD.-SUBSIDIARY OF TARMAC. Originally the quarry,about 1 mile north of Ullapool,was used as a source of building lime. In 1957,the quarry began as a commercial enterprise. Employing 14 men,the quarry produces, on average, 60 000 tonnes p.a.. The very high-quality magnesium limestone is used mainly by the agricultural industry.The quarry face works a top bench level,60ft.high and bottom bench level 50ft.high. USES IN 1985 -Agricultural magnesium limestone-Â£8.90/tonne-to neutralise soil and increase magnesium content: Armour stone (1/2-4t/stone)-Â£4.75/t.- river/sea bank reinforcement:4"crusher run-Â£2.76/t.-1 1/2" crusher run Â£3.88/ t.-sub-base road construction:3/4" aggregate-Â£4.65/t.-making concrete Dust-Â£4.26/t.-road binding.(+15% VAT.)
